quiz.question: The '!!' command does which of the following
What command kills a specified process
The 'tr' command does which of the following
quiz.option1: translates one set of characters to another
quiz.option2: copy a file from one computer to another

quiz.question: The 'gzip' command does which of the following
quiz.option2: matches plain text with the specified pattern
quiz.option3: change password for a user account

quiz.question: What command searchs plain-text and prints lines matching a specified pattern
